getRate

nodes.documentation: @return the currency encoded as a bytes32
nodes.name: encodeCurrency

statements.operations:
{
    ns := div(ns, 8)
    o := mload(0x40)
    mstore(0x40, add(o, and(add(add(ns, 0x20), 0x1f), not(0x1f))))
    mstore(o, ns)
    mstore(add(o, 32), b)
}

nodes.documentation: @return the currency string from a encoded bytes32
nodes.name: decodeCurrency

statements.operations:
{
    ns := div(ns, 8)
    o := mload(0x40)
    mstore(0x40, add(o, and(add(add(ns, 0x20), 0x1f), not(0x1f))))

nodes.documentation: @return the currency string from a encoded bytes32
nodes.name: decodeCurrency

devdoc.details: Defines the interface of a standard RCN oracle. The oracle is an agent in the RCN network that supplies a convertion rate between RCN and any other currency, it's primarily used by the exchange but could be used by any other agent.

addCurrency(string).details: Adds a currency to the oracle, once added it cannot be removed
addCurrency(string).return: if the creation was done successfully

decodeCurrency(bytes32).return: the currency string from a encoded bytes32

encodeCurrency(string).return: the currency encoded as a bytes32

getRate(bytes32,bytes).details: Returns a valid convertion rate from the currency given to RCN

params.data: Generic data field, could be used for off-chain signing

transferTo(address).details: Transfers the ownership of the contract.

url().details: Returns the url where the oracle exposes a valid "oracleData" if needed
